name: LIFE SAVER (Dilara)
description:
LIFE SAVER

Our character is trying to collect things and increasing the score while reaching to finish line. There are three levels in this game. You can change the camera by using 1 and 2 numbers on the keyboard. Have fun! Please leave a comment for us!

Developers:

Eren Karataş, Dilara Akpınar

Designer:

Koray Şen
